t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon Basics (formerly written as AmazonBasics) is a private label that offers home goods, office supplies, and tech accessories. The line was launched in 2009. As of December 2017, Amazon Basics is the best-selling private label brand on Amazon.com. In November 2018, AmazonBasics expanded ...

t: Amazon beats Apple to become the world's most valuable brand
s: Rising in brand value by an impressive 52% year-on-year to $315.5 billion, Amazon moves ahead of Apple (no.2, $309.5 billion) and Google (no.3, $309 billion) which both rose by a modest +3% and +2% respectively, to end the technology giants’ 12-year dominance.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Did You Know? Amazon Owns Scores of Private Label and Exclusive Brands - SellerEngine
s: January 6, 2023 - They’re called ‘Private’ because they are Amazon’s PL brands. These products were developed by Amazon, but they tend to be cheaper versions of essential and sought-after big-brand items. They are offered on all venues, and they are featured heavily on search results pages.

t: Apple now has the most valuable brand in the world at more than $260 billion, surpassing Amazon and Google
s: January 27, 2021 - Apple just passed Amazon for the first time in five years to become the most valuable brand in the world at $263.4 billion.

t: Amazon owns more than 80 private-label brands — see the list
s: October 8, 2018 - Everyone knows Amazon owns brands like AmazonBasics, but there are many more that are less obvious. Some of the private-label brands are even exclusive to Prime members. See some of the brands you didn't realize were owned by Amazon.

t: 6 Companies Owned by Amazon
s: Whole Foods, MGM Holdings, Zappos, Kiva, Pillpack, and Twitch are the major companies owned by Amazon.

t: 7 Brands That You May Not Know Are Owned By Amazon - SlashGear
s: April 6, 2025 - You probably know by now that Amazon houses many brands under its umbrella, but here's a couple you might not have realised the tech giant owns.

t: Amazon.com: Richer Poorer
s: Richer Poorer is innerwear that makes every day a good one: well-made, beautifully designed socks, boxer briefs, and tees you can’t wait to put on and don’t want to take off.

t: Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).
